content:
**size ** holder is 2 inches high and 7 inches across candle is any height desired
**yarn ** acrylic 4-ply knitting worsted weight yarn * 1/2 oz medium green for leaves * 1/2 oz dark green for leaves * few yards red for berries * 1/2 oz color of choice for candle * few yards yellow for flame **other requirements ** * size g hook * cardboard tube from paper towels or toilet paper * yarn needle direct pdf link http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/xmascandles pdf 1 > previously available at the crochet works http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/xmas html 1 http //botherthebirds net/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/xmascandles pdf
